title: The Last Dance
description: Can you truly forgive and forget?Ambri and Henry have been best friends forever. They've been through the highs and lows of life with each other by their sides. The worst? When Henry's wife, and Ambri's sister, died. Together, they can face it all. Until one night destroys everything.Two years after he stepped out of it Henry walks back into Ambri's life and she's more than a little shocked. But as old friends fall into even older habits they need to decide whether they can forget the past and embrace their future.Perfect for fans of Nicholas Sparks, Jodi Picoult and Anna Bell.
author: Aimee Brown
